name: tri142 - BalloonRider
description:
tri142 - entry.
Theme was 'True or false'. I struggled in implementing the UI, especially buttons. The plan was to control the balloon by by solving equations. Right Answer=thrust up, Wrong Answer = thrust down. But it just didn't work... funky buttons 😐😆
Therefore not much of the theme is left. Steering is now done with Arrow UP and Arrow DOWN
